doc.field: Lively, informal neighborhood spot, sunny during the day, grungy at night, serving inexpensive tapas inspired by...
You will have to wait for a table -- two hours is not uncommon -- at this swinging Caribbean restaurant in the Haight...
Decadent tapas, stellar sangria and a lively crowd keep this Upper Haight spot alive and kicking.
